table.mysql: CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.properties}` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `content_type` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `position` int(11) unsigned default '1', `type` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `value` blob, `public` int(1) NOT NULL default '1', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.properties_details}` ( `property_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL default 'title', `lang` char(2) NOT NULL default '', `description` tinytext NOT NULL, `modified` int(1) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`property_id`,`lang`), UNIQUE KEY `property_id` (`property_id`,`lang`) );

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.properties_groups_details}` ( `group_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `lang` varchar(5) NOT NULL default '', `title` varchar(255) default NULL, `description` varchar(255) default NULL, `modified` int(1) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`group_id`,`lang`) );

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.properties_values}` ( `property_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `content_type` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `content_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `content_sub_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `lang` char(2) NOT NULL default '', `level` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL default '1', `label` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `value` blob, `from_pgroup` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `modified` int(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`property_id`,`content_type`,`content_id`,`content_sub_id`,`lang`,`level`) );
